title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in the Preferences -> Workbench settings. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action is always enabled in the Java popup menus, irrespective of the selection made in the Preferences -> Workbench settings.
EB: The 'Build' action should not be enabled in the Java popup menus if the user has selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in the Preferences -> Workbench settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open Eclipse IDE in the Java perspective.
2. Go to 'Window' -> 'Preferences'.
3. In the left panel, expand 'General' and select 'Workbench'.
4. Check the option 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
5. Close the Preferences dialog.
6. Right-click on a Java file in the Package Explorer or Editor window.
7. Observe the context-sensitive popup menu and verify if the 'Build' action is enabled.
